text: Hello everyone, I am Juan, I work with Sarah, please send me by private if you are interested. Thank you!

A great agency is looking for a few positions. unreal digital group. They are looking for someone really strong with marketing automation in HubSpot. They also work in marketo and pardot, so that experience is a plus. They are remote agency with most people in the pacific timezone.  Check them out here <https://www.unrealdigitalgroup.com/careers/>
I’m not involved with this company, we partner on projects together. I’m posting this in here to help them, if you are interested, please reach out to them directly on their website
